description: What can you make with pork, peanut butter, sweet chilli sauce, soy sauce and udon noodles? Udon fritters of course! Ready in four steps, it's the ultimate snack.
keywords: Savoury fritter,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Summer,Mince,Pork,Quick & easy lunch,Autumn,Dairy free,Apr 2021
name: Udon Fritters Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs soy sauce (plus extra to serve)
1 red chilli, deseeded, deseeded, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place mince in a large bowl. Using hands, mix in one direction until sticky. Add peanut butter, sauces and cornflour, then mix until combined.

Roughly cut noodles with kitchen scissors, then add to bowl with half of the onion and mix until just combined. Using wet hands, shape 2 tbs mixture into a fritter. Repeat with remaining mixture to make a total of 20 fritters.

Heat 1 tbs oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add 5 fritters to pan and cook for 2 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a wire rack set over a baking tray. Cover to keep warm. Repeat with remaining oil and fritters.
Stir half of the chilli through the extra soy sauce. Sprinkle remaining chilli and onion over fritters, and serve with soy sauce mixture.
